author: LumApps

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage:
Here is the format for valid commit messages: 
<type>(<scope>): <subject>
<BLANK LINE>
<body>
<BLANK LINE>
<footer>


The scope must be in kebab-case

If your commit message starts with 'WIP', then no commit validation will be enforced.
validate-commit-msg.subjectPatternErrorMsg: Commit subject is not valid. It must start with a lowercase letter or a number, be at least one word long and not end with a dot.

description: The official LumApps Design System (LumX) for AngularJS and React applications
name: @lumx/lumx

scripts.build:all: npm run build:core; npm run build:react; npm run build:angularjs
scripts.build:core: webpack --config webpack/core/webpack.prod.js && MINIFY=true GENERATE_PACKAGE=true webpack --config webpack/core/webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:angularjs: webpack --config webpack/angularjs/webpack.prod.js && MINIFY=true GENERATE_PACKAGE=true webpack --config webpack/angularjs/webpack.prod.js
scripts.bump:core:major: cd src/core && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package.json && cd -
scripts.postbump:core:major: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new major version for @lumx/core'
scripts.bump:core:minor: cd src/core && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package.json && cd -
scripts.postbump:core:minor: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new minor version for @lumx/core'
scripts.bump:core:patch: cd src/core && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json && cd -
scripts.postbump:core:patch: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new patch version for @lumx/core'
scripts.bump:react:major: cd src/core/react && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package.json && cd - && npm run version-changelog:react
scripts.postbump:react:major: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new major version for @lumx/react'
scripts.bump:react:minor: cd src/core/react && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package.json && cd - && npm run version-changelog:react
scripts.postbump:react:minor: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new minor version for @lumx/react'
scripts.bump:react:patch: cd src/core/react && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json && cd - && npm run version-changelog:react
scripts.postbump:react:patch: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new patch version for @lumx/react'
scripts.bump:angularjs:major: cd src/core/angularjs && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package.json && cd -
scripts.postbump:angularjs:major: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new major version for @lumx/angularjs'
scripts.bump:angularjs:minor: cd src/core/angularjs && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package.json && cd -
scripts.postbump:angularjs:minor: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new minor version for @lumx/angularjs'
scripts.bump:angularjs:patch: cd src/core/angularjs && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json && cd -
scripts.postbump:angularjs:patch: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new patch version for @lumx/angularjs'
scripts.bump:icons:major: cd src/icons && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package.json && cd -;
scripts.postbump:icons:major: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new major version for @lumx/icons'
scripts.bump:icons:minor: cd src/icons && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package.json && cd -;
scripts.postbump:icons:minor: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new minor version for @lumx/icons'
scripts.bump:icons:patch: cd src/icons && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json && cd -;
scripts.postbump:icons:patch: git commit --message 'chore(release): release new patch version for @lumx/icons'
scripts.format: npm run format:demo && npm run format:src
scripts.format:demo: npm run format:demo:js && npm run format:demo:ts && npm run format:demo:style
scripts.format:src: npm run format:src:js && npm run format:src:ts && npm run format:src:style
scripts.lint: npm run lint:config; npm run lint:demo; npm run lint:src
scripts.lint:demo: npm run lint:demo:js; npm run lint:demo:ts; npm run lint:demo:style
scripts.lint:src: npm run lint:src:js; npm run lint:src:ts; npm run lint:src:style
scripts.release:core:major: npm run bump:core:major && npm run publish-package:core
scripts.release:core:minor: npm run bump:core:minor && npm run publish-package:core
scripts.release:core:patch: npm run bump:core:patch && npm run publish-package:core
scripts.release:react:major: npm run bump:react:major && npm run publish-package:react
scripts.release:react:minor: npm run bump:react:minor && npm run publish-package:react
scripts.release:react:patch: npm run bump:react:patch && npm run publish-package:react
scripts.release:angularjs:major: npm run bump:angularjs:major && npm run publish-package:angularjs
scripts.release:angularjs:minor: npm run bump:angularjs:minor && npm run publish-package:angularjs
scripts.release:angularjs:patch: npm run bump:angularjs:patch && npm run publish-package:angularjs
scripts.release:icons:major: npm run bump:icons:major && npm run publish-package:icons
scripts.release:icons:minor: npm run bump:icons:minor && npm run publish-package:icons
scripts.release:icons:patch: npm run bump:icons:patch && npm run publish-package:icons
scripts.release:major: npm run release:core:major && npm run release:react:major && npm run release:angularjs:major && npm run release:icons:major
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:core:minor && npm run release:react:minor && npm run release:angularjs:minor && npm run release:icons:minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:core:patch && npm run release:react:patch && npm run release:angularjs:patch && npm run release:icons:patch
scripts.setup: yarn install; cd ./src/icons/; yarn install; cd -
scripts.start:angularjs: nodemon --watch webpack --ignore webpack/react --ignore webpack/.eslintrc.js node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server -- --config webpack/angularjs/webpack.dev.js --hot
scripts.start:react: nodemon --watch webpack --ignore webpack/angularjs --ignore webpack/.eslintrc.js node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server -- --config webpack/react/webpack.demo-site.js --hot
scripts.test: npm run test:angularjs && npm run test:react
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:angularjs:ci && npm run test:react:ci
scripts.version-changelog:react: cd src/core/react && ../../../node_modules/.bin/version-changelog ../../../CHANGELOG.react.md && cd - && git add CHANGELOG.react.md
